context.p: To install the Eucalyptus Windows Integration Service:

step.cmd: Use yum or apt-get to download the Eucalyptus tool.

info.codeblock: yum install eucalyptus-windows-tools apt-get install eucalyptus-windows-tools

step.cmd: Download the Windows Image Preparation Tool from http://downloads.eucalyptus.com/software/tools/windows-prep/windows-prep-tools-3.1.0.iso to the Windows host that runs vSphere client. You might need SFTP client on the Windows host.
Use the VMware vSphere client to upload the ISO file to the VSphere datastore.
Attach the windows-prep-tools-3.1.0.iso to the Windows VM.
Log in to Windows and find the Eucalyptus installation files in the CDROM drive.

choices.choice: For Windows Server 2003 R2, run setup.exe. This automatically installs the .NET framework 2.0, which is not bundled in Server 2003 R2.
For all other versions, run EucalyptusWindowsIntegration.msi.

step.cmd: In the Choose your hypervisor step, click VMWARE.

image.alt: Eucalyptus Windows Integrator select hypervisor window
